content: सूचक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (चिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सूच्-ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Indicative, indicating, proving, showing. {@--2@} Betraying, informing. --कः {@--1@} A piercer. {@--2@} A needle, any instrument for perforating or sewing. {@--3@} An informer, a talebearer, traducer, spy. {@--4@} A narrator, teacher, an instructor. {@--5@} The manager or chief actor of a company. {@--6@} A Buddha. {@--7@} A {%Siddha%}. {@--8@} A villain, scoundrel. {@--9@} A demon, goblin. {@--10@} A dog. {@--11@} A crow. {@--12@} A cat. {@--13@} A kind of fine rice.
